summary: This mod adds a Bigfoot (troll model) creature that you can randomly run into while exploring Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Bigfoot (troll model) creature that you can randomly run into while exploring Skyrim. 

How it works: 

This mod changes the LCharAmbientCreatures LVLN form list and adds more Hares and Foxes, and a Bigfoot creature. This means that there is a small chance of spawning a Bigfoot instead of a hare or fox at a LvlAmbientCreatures spawn point (there are 367 of them in skyrim). 

If you are using a Mod that also changes the LCharAmbientCreatures form, there will be a conflict. 

No other modifications were made, Bigfoot creatures and AI data were created.
author: BDGray02 Dirtfoot84
